channel.title: CVE Feed for Echenley -- Counterpoint
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Echenley -- Counterpoint

item.title: CVE-2024-37559|2024-07-21T06:48:53.508Z -- echenley -- counterpoint
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Echenley Counterpoint allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Counterpoint: from n/a through 1.8.1.
